    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public String authenticate(T token,
                           TokenTypeId tokenTypeId)
                    throws TokenValidationException
        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface AuthenticationHandler<T>
        Parameters:
        token - the to-be-authentication token
        tokenTypeId - the type of the to-be-authenticated token. Necessary to obtain the AuthTargetMapping defining the rest authN url configured for the sts instance for this particular token type.
        Returns:
        the OpenAM session id corresponding to the successfully authenticated token
        Throws:
        TokenValidationException - if the token could not be successfully validated
